title: The American Stake in the Taiwan Strait
description:
The recently concluded Chinese Communist Party Congress makes clear that the threat to Taiwan is not only real, but intensifying. And the stakes are high for Taiwan’s security and freedom. No one wants to see Taiwan become another Ukraine. But, the stakes are also high for the U.S. A CCP takeover of Taiwan would dramatically undermine U.S. economic and geostrategic interests, not just in the Indo-Pacific theatre, but throughout the globe.

Join us as Senator Dan Sullivan addresses the importance of Taiwan to the U.S. and why we can’t afford to lose it to Communist China.

Sign up to receive invitations to all public events.

Terms and Conditions of Attendance
